introduction: Following a year-long surveillance and evidence-gathering operation, police make a dramatic arrest of Zeljko Matic Zeljc, a former member of an international drug cartel. His arrest is preceded by the murder of a police superintendent and the discovery in Mexico of the body of a woman declared deceased by Croatian police seven years earlier. Ordering her murder was among the key charges against Zeljc, so the police must now investigate who was really killed seven years ago, whether that murder is related to that of the superintendent, and if Zeljc continued running his operations from his prison cell.
